amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 116-14 to clarify that the exemption from the background check requirement in instances of imminent threats of death or great bodily harm would apply to someone who is at risk of committing suicide.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dean amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Dean.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dean amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
